answerTexts: A small cavity in the cytoplasm of a cell, bound by a single membrane and containing water, food, or metabolic waste
Consisting of interconnected or interwoven parts; composite.
A small region of cytoplasm adjacent to the nucleus that contains the centrioles and serves to organize microtubules.
A minute round particle composed of RNA and protein that is found in the cytoplasm of living cells and serves as the site of assembly for polypeptides encoded by messenger RNA.
